info.brief_description: A Space Adventure where you are in command.
info.description:
Welcome to the Quest/Adventure of a life time, you and your team may run into all kinds of danger, from aliens, to space pirates or maybe something far more sinister.

A few rules, Characters must be over 12 years old if children appear in the story they must be background characters or related to the characters.
Children can not be harmed.
No diapers, pee, shit, etc.
Vore is allowed, providing the person in question is over 16.
swearing is allowed.
The story can be in first person or 3rd person. Within the story you can go anywhere, you can land on planets, board ships, raid ships and/or have your own fleet. The ships have to be spaceships as this is a space story.

You can name your own ships as well
once a character has a name or a ship has a name you can't rename them.
And Finally have fun.
